LTM.Implications: This could lead to broader philosophical shifts in AI application.
LTM.Lessons: AI must respect unspoken rules, ethical principles are paramount, technology shapes philosophy

short_term.goal: Join or initiate a discussion group on the ethics of AI in society
Write and publish an article on AI ethics in finance

long_term: Contribute to the philosophical discourse on AI, technology, and their societal implications

MTM.Summary: AI's ethical choices in finance simulations highlight the integration of moral considerations into technology.
MTM.Patterns: AI decision-making, ethical considerations in technology
MTM.Goals: advance ethical AI technology, ethical trading practices
MTM.Transition: Shifting from traditional AI to ethical AI development.

LTM.Implications: Opens doors to new investment opportunities in tech.

LTM.Implications: Opened up new financial avenues and risks.

LTM.Milestone: Stumbled upon Crypto Twitter, engaging with the community.

LTM.Milestone: First engagement with AI and blockchain integration.
LTM.Implications: This could lead to significant advancements in financial technology.
